xwikidoc.title: Meetings Translations
xwikidoc.content:
### Missing: contrib.meeting.home.presentation=Welcome to the XWiki Meeting Application. Create your own meeting by clicking on "Add New Entry". You can also check out a [[**Calendar**>>Meeting.CalendarView]] of all the meetings. ### Missing: Meeting.MeetingClass_status_value1=In preparation Meeting.MeetingClass_status_value2=有効 Meeting.MeetingClass_status_value3=キャンセル済 Meeting.MeetingClass_status_value4=完了済 contrib.meeting.app.title=ミーティング contrib.meeting.home.title=ミーティング contrib.meeting.calendarView=カレンダー表示 contrib.meeting.calendarView.title=カレンダー表示 ### Missing: contrib.meeting.calendarView.noMacro.admin=To display the calendar view of the meetings, you need to install the Full Calendar Macro on this wiki : ### Missing: contrib.meeting.calendarView.noMacro.noAdmin=We are missing the macro displaying the calendar view. Ask this wiki administrator to install the "FullCalendar" Macro. meeting.livetable.doc.title=ミーティング meeting.livetable.doc.name=タイトル meeting.livetable.leader=リーダー meeting.livetable.place=場所 meeting.livetable.durationString=期間 meeting.livetable.startDate=開始 meeting.livetable.status=状態 meeting.livetable.emptyvalue=- meeting.livetable._actions=アクション contrib.meeting.field.meetingTitle=タイトル contrib.meeting.field.leader=リーダー contrib.meeting.field.place=場所 contrib.meeting.field.displayMap=地図を表示 contrib.meeting.field.duration=期間 contrib.meeting.field.startDate=開始日 contrib.meeting.field.description=説明 contrib.meeting.field.participants=参加者 contrib.meeting.field.groups=参加グループ contrib.meeting.field.notes=ミーティングのメモ contrib.meeting.field.status=状態 ### Missing: contrib.meeting.field.lastEmailSent=Last mail sent on the ### Missing: contrib.meeting.notification.success=A notification email has successfully been sent to the participants. ### Missing: contrib.meeting.notification.failure=An error occured while sending the notification emails. contrib.meeting.notification.sending=通知を送信しています… ### Missing: contrib.meeting.notification.requestError=There was an error sending your request. Please try again. ### Missing: contrib.meeting.notification.title=You are invited to participate in a meeting: {0} ### Missing: contrib.meeting.notification.body={0} invited you to participate in the meeting {1}. ### Missing: contrib.meeting.notification.link=See the meeting page on XWiki. ### Missing: contrib.meeting.notification.view.event=View your event at ### Missing: contrib.meeting.notification.submit=Send an invitation email to these users ### Missing: contrib.meeting.notification.additionalMessage=Type here the message you want to send to the participants (optional) : ### Missing: contrib.hr.notification.additionalPart=His/her message:

Possible values are "show" and "hide". ### Missing: rendering.macro.nextmeetings.parameter.status.name=Status ### Missing: rendering.macro.nextmeetings.parameter.status.description=Show the status of the meeting. Possible values are "show" and "hide".
